string-array.name: acid_base_q1
string-array.item: Which of these indicators is useless foe detecting acids?
Cresolphthalein, Congo red, Methyl yellow, Bromocresol green
All phthaleins in aqueous solutions are insensible towards acids, so the correct answer is cresolphthalein.

string-array.name: acid_base_q2
string-array.item: What measurement of the pH scale is considered a neutral liquid?
pH values below 7 are acidic, above 7 are basic and 7 is neutral.

string-array.name: acid_base_q3
string-array.item: Which of the following is a way that acids and bases are used in science and technology?
All of the Above, Batteries, Household cleaning products, Fertilizer
All of these products contain alkaline or acidic substances and are used in technological applications.

string-array.name: acid_base_q4
string-array.item: What is the pH value of orange juice?
pH value of 1 represents 1 a strong acid, 6 is only slightly acidic while 3 seems to be the best match.

string-array.name: acid_base_q5
string-array.item: What is the pH value of milk of magnesia?
pH value of 3 represents a rather strong acid, 6 and 8 are nearly neutral while 3 seems to be the best match.
